file_content.text: Calm the evacuees--the transports will be ready any moment now. The Republic will not lose Taris.
Taris's reconstruction dies here--with you.
Too late, Cerik.
Finally, the intruders show themselves.
I'm going to enjoy killing you, Cerik.
No one's leaving this spaceport alive.
They're as good as dead.
We're going to kill every last one of you.
Didn't mean to interrupt your speech. Please, continue.
Your talk is useless.
So--the Empire finally plays its last hand. Your mockery won't shake us.
But my lightsaber will.
Darth Gravus is amazingly predictable. This is a trap, and you walked right into it.
The evacuation transports that arrived weren't empty. They brought friends, ready to defend Taris. Perhaps you're familiar with them.
This is it! Defend Taris with your lives!
Only the Republic would consider this ragtag crew sufficient defense.
I'm not impressed.
We're strengthened by our cause.
Yes, I've met their kind before... and made them squirm.
Familiar with killing them.
It's about time we wipe your vile presence from this planet.
I've blasted these goons before. I'll do it again.
Familiar with killing them.
We'll see about that.
You'd need an entire fleet of reinforcements to take me down.
You're still outmatched.
I think we'll do just fine.
Stop stalling. [Attack]
